snippet: Mr. Stamp hoped to make a documentary about a rising rock group, but he ended up becoming far more than an observer of the Who.
abstract: Chris Stamp, who managed British rock band the Who, dies at age 70.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Stamp hoped to make a documentary about a rising rock group, but he ended up becoming far more than an observer of the Who.

headline.seo: Chris Stamp, a Manager and Discoverer of the Who, Dies at 70
headline.main: Chris Stamp, a Manager and Discoverer of the Who, Dies at 70
headline.print_headline: Chris Stamp, 70, a Manager of the Who
